r.d: SDL_mixer extension for PHP provides the binding of functions for audio loading, playing and mixing.
r.n: - Fix SDL extension dependency (remicollet) - Add workaround for Mix_HasMusicDecoder where not available (remicollet) - Properly init/quit sdl_mixer library (remicollet) - Improve phpinfo with Mix_Init supported flags (remicollet) - Add missing 'src' build directory in config.m4 (kea)
